name: JSON and JSONB creation functions
description: JSON and JSONB creation functions see https://www.postgresql.org/docs/14/functions-json.html#FUNCTIONS-JSON-CREATION-TABLE

to_json.description: Converts any SQL value to JSON.

to_jsonb.description: Converts any SQL value to JSONB.

array_to_json.description: Converts an SQL array to a JSON array.

row_to_json.description: Converts an SQL composite value to a JSON object.

json_build_array.description: Builds a possibly-heterogeneously-typed JSON array out of a variadic argument list.

jsonb_build_array.description: Builds a possibly-heterogeneously-typed JSONB array out of a variadic argument list.

json_build_object.description: Builds a JSON object out of a variadic argument list.

json_object.description: Builds a JSON object out of a text array.
This form of json_object takes keys and values pairwise from separate text arrays.

jsonb_object.description: Builds a JSONB object out of a text array.
This form of jsonb_object takes keys and values pairwise from separate text arrays.
